setDestination

long setDestination(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.deviceModel.JointPosition newDestination)
Set the destination in Joint space.
Note: setDestination() calls internally IServoRuntime.updateWithRealtimeSystem()

Parameters:
newDestination - the new Destination to set
Returns:
Timestamp in milliseconds

setDestination

long setDestination(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.geometricModel.math.ITransformation numericalGoalRepresentation)
Set the numerical destination In Default, the Reference is "World" - if the frame was modified/changed/attached with the function setRealtimeDestination(Frame) the reference frame will be w.r.t those settings. Note: setDestination() calls internally updateWithRealtimeSystem().

Parameters:
numericalGoalRepresentation - Transformation of the Goal
Returns:
Timestamp in milliseconds
This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.
